features: Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Water Gel face moisturizer instantly quenches dry skin & locks in clinically proven hydration for 24 hours

Neck & face moisturizer for dry skin is lightweight, oil free, non-comedogenic, & formulated with hyaluronic acid, a hydrator naturally found in skin that binds to water & holds it within skin's surface for more supple & smooth skin

Water gel face moisturizer absorbs quickly like a gel, but provides long-lasting & intense moisturizing power of a face cream to boost skin's hydration level & lock it in all day. It delivers 4x hydration for quenched, dewy skin (vs. untreated skin)

Suitable for daily use, apply the hydrating water gel moisturizer to face & neck after cleansing as a part of your daily skincare routine to instantly quench dry skin & keep it looking smooth, supple, & hydrated day after day

1.7-ounce jar of Neutrogena Hydro Boost hydrating water gel daily face & neck moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to hydrate dry skin. Designed with the Earth in mind. We've removed the window & plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling
body.description: Product Description Use Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Water Gel Face & Neck Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid to instantly quench dry skin & boost's skin's hydration level within skin's surface. This oil-free, non-comedogenic face moisturizer delivers 4x more hydration for quenched, dewy skin (vs. untreated skin) & to keep skin looking smooth, supple, & hydrated day after day. The unique water gel formula absorbs quickly like a gel, but has the long-lasting, intense moisturizing power of a cream. This oil-free daily gel moisturizer is formulated with hyaluronic acid, a hydrator naturally found in skin that binds to water & holds it in. From a dermatologist-recommended brand, this non-comedogenic gel facial moisturizer won't clog pores & can be worn under makeup. Add this hyaluronic acid moisturizer to your at-home daily skincare routine with other hydrating products within the Neutrogena Hydro Boost line. We've removed the window & plastic tray from this carton for easier recycling. Brand Story By Neutrogena.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent face moisturizer. It doesn't clog pores, or leave a greasy feeling. It feels like a gelled water when applying. leave me with rich moisturized skin. Especially great for winter months. I will be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have never had a product hydrate my face so well. I will forever use this product, it’s my holy grail. Perfect for people with a dry face and sensitive skin! The smell is very fresh and mild.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great moisturizer. My skin feels so soft. This moisturizer is light weight absorbs quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the affect on my skin
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 1.7 oz and it looks like the packaging to the 0.5 oz not sure if it’s just a new design but overall I’d say the feel of this water gel is actually refreshing and super moisturizing. My skin has never felt so soft. The product is lightweight and non greasy which is a huge plus. I’d say the only thing keeping it from being 5 stars for me would be the fragrance, it smells kinda like laundry soap and I’m not too fond of putting any fragrance in my skin care. Other than the fragrance this product is a must have for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! Must buy
reviews.reviewText: I’ve waited to write this review because I wanted to test the product for a few weeks and see how it really works! I use it daily nightly and in the morning my skin totally is more hydrated and feel if this product once it’s applied is so nice. A little goes a long ways the smell is not overwhelming, it does not leave a sticky film or residue I will purchase this product again and continue to use it daily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No smell. Little goes a long way. Absorbs completely into skin. My face is really smooth now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I took a risk in switching from my expensive Dr. Dennis gross face lotion from Sephora to this. I had been thinking it was time to try some thing a little bit more reasonable in the hopes that it still provided with my face with the moisture it needed.I’m so happy you’re did because this face lotion is super lightweight, leaves my face, feeling moisturized, and has never caused a break out or blemish. I have been using it for a couple years now and I am very happy with how it works.The one thing I would say is that container it comes in is very thick, and the part that the lotion actually sits in his quite small. This can cause the container to be a little bit misleading with how much lotion isn’t it. However, if you look at how much lotion they claim to have in the container, it does have that much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST face moisturizer!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This face moisturizer is in a league of its own. I’m shocked it’s not more well known. I love how it hydrates and seals everything in your skin without leaving a greasy residue. It’s just right.There’s not much more to say other than this IS my go to for my combination skin. The price point is also much better than the drug store!
Rien à dire de négatif,tout fait avec ordre;)

reviews.reviewTitle: Value for money, hydrating good product
reviews.reviewText: It is a very good product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My favourite moisturiser product, I don't like heavy creams like Nivea, so this is perfect.

Compré este producto a través de la cuenta de mi esposo, deseaba probarlo ya que había leído excelentes reseñas sobre este gel hidrante. No sé equivocaron, es MARAVILLOSO. Estoy encantada con mi compra, te deja la piel ultra suave e hidratada, se siente desde el primer contacto, hasta hoy llevo 4 días usándolo y mi cutis ha mejorado bastante, es increíble la rapidez con la que actúa. Yo tengo piel grasa y me sirve mucho para las mañanas ya que estoy muy activa y expuesta al sol. Lo uso después de aplicar mi jabón limpiador Avēne, el cual también recomiendo demasiado, este producto reseca un poco la piel ya que te hace una limpieza extrema, pero al usar el HidroBoost de Neutrogena, es el complemento perfecto porque compensa esa resequedad y mi rostro queda limpio e impecable, después de estos dos agrego mi agua termal, mi crema hidratante y bloqueador solar, son los complementos perfectos de todo cuidado facial.No sé arrepentirán de comprarlo, huele delicioso, muy fresco, rinde bastante ya que son una solo una toma cubres tu cara bastante bien, aparte el precio es súper accesible para un producto dermatológico. La paqueteria tardo solo dos días, lo pedí un domingo y llegó martes, perfectamente empacado sin rayones o falta de producto, lo pedí junto a otros productos de limpieza facial. Excelente, es maravilloso.
